title: I LOST LP FOR WINNING A RANKED GAME
body:
I was playing ranked and i was doing great janna support 1/3/17,fed varus adc 17/1/7,ez win right?
NOP
Storm started (while i was in the game) and coz i am liveing in the settlement next to the city me and my neighbors lost power (electricity) in home
Ofc that happened after we killed more then half of ther team and we started takeing inhb 
When i dc my team took baron and ended with no problem coz adc and top were fed
BUT
They needed less then  10 min after i dc to finish the job...
So i got 0 lp and lost 3 lp that i had from 1 win 1 lose before that and now i am at 0 lp and scared coz i know i will get demoted if i lose next game....
If u didnt put me on 0 lp,game from demoting  I wouldn't wrote all of this 


time i dc 23:00 min - time when the game ended 29:30 min 
my team won


Please Riot have some mercy

replies.body: I looked into this for you and it does look like you were marked as a leaver for this match, which would result as a loss even if the team won.  I know this was out of your control, but all leaves still cause others a negative experience even if it's not intentional.  Hopefully, everything has cleared up for you and you'll be able to get your LP back next game!
